thread.title: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots & bon mots
thread.title_full: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots & bon mots - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Scott Ostler
title: Scott Ostler’s deep thoughts, cheap shots & bon mots
text: •If Jim Tomsula and Trent Baalke believe Jarryd Hayne isn’t ready to play NFL games, the solution is simple: Trade him now, to the Seattle Seahawks. Pete Carroll would love to get his hands on the Australian. Then, assuming the 49ers are right about Hayne being all flash and fumbles, the 49ers stick the Seahawks with a dud.
